text: The Arrow network upgrade occurred overnight and is now complete.    The block reward has been reduced from 70 to 55 $ARW per block and the transactional limit has been increased to 250 kb, thereby increasing transactional throughput.  Please make sure your wallet is up to date.
#Arrow forked ~1h ago (block #349440). Congrats to the $ARW team for the smooth transition!  Wanna mine it? Come join us!
